backend/main.mo: Empty backend actor; no backend logic needed for mainnet deployment.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two solution‑related features to their source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including routing, layout, content system, and styling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Checklist document outlining steps to verify and deploy the frontend asset canister to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining brand color tokens, theme variables, and base light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, metadata, and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Release notes detailing the v1.0.0 mainnet deployment, included features, routes, assets, and smoke test requirements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React App component providing the router and theme provider for the entire frontend.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandButto: Shadcn Button wrapper providing brand‑specific primary, secondary, and accent variants.
Brand logo component that renders the primary logo with a text fallback on load error.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentR: Renders structured content sections with support for headings, text, lists, emphasis, and link‑list blocks.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Site footer rendering brand info and navigation links for Solutions, Industries, and Company sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Navigation header with active state logic, solutions dropdown, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level page layout wrapping header, footer, and content with scroll-sync provider.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Homepage hero section with background image, headline, and CTA buttons.
Maps page IDs to canonical Google Drive source documents for manual content reference.
frontend/src/content/contentTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for structured page content blocks and sections.
frontend/src/content/pages.ts: Registry of page content definitions for solutions and subpages using structured blocks.
frontend/src/content/solutionServicePage: Content definitions for individual solution service pages with sections and feature lists.
frontend/src/content/solutionServices.ts: Master registry mapping solution services to their metadata, routes, and parent categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageTitle.ts: Updates the document title based on the given page title and brand name, restoring the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future backend query hooks with no current functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive light/dark theme color variables for the site's design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ContentPage.tsx: Renders dynamic content pages with themed styling, banner handling, and fallback behavior for missing content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section and summaries of solution categories using styled cards and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a branded 404 page with an illustration and a button linking back to the homepage.
Displays the solutions landing page with a hero banner and scroll-synced category sections populated from navigation data.
frontend/src/router/router.tsx: Defines the app's routing structure, including root layout, solution and industry pages, and dynamic service routes.
frontend/src/site/brand.ts: Provides brand constants including name, domain, logo path, and contact info.
frontend/src/site/industryThemes.ts: Defines color themes for industry pages and provides a lookup function by page ID.
frontend/src/site/navigation.ts: Defines the site's navigation tree and provides a helper to flatten all routes.
frontend/src/site/pageBannerResolver.ts: Resolves banner images using filename conventions with fallback to a predefined mapping.
frontend/src/site/pageBanners.ts: Maps page IDs to their banner images and alt text for solutions, industries, about, and contact pages.
frontend/src/site/pageThemes.ts: Provides theme resolution for pages based on solutions or industry-specific themes.
frontend/src/solutions/solutionsScrollSy: Implements context for tracking the active solutions category and resetting it when leaving the page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, and pending requests related to syncing the solutions dropdown with scroll behavior.
